column5: Well I was talking to the boys at Bills Bait N Tackle about Moe's G2G and they offered up some prizes for the table Moe!!! Here is a snapshot Shimano Hat & T-Shirt combos Okuma Hats a Collapsible Bait Bucket Led Hat Light! Thanks Bills Bait N Tackle! I will be bringing these to the G2G for the Prize table. Gerritt.

Kudos to Bill's bait and Tackle!  No one prize or controbution may seem like a lot by itself but together........ Kind of like grains of sand; put enough of them together and you have one heck of a nice beach!  We have to remember to let all of the people that have supported us know that we really appreciate it!
Thanks Bills bait and Tackle. While I am far away now I will use you when I get into the Hamilton area.  Art
